author: jcian
msg: Added more documentation and unit tests to the LockService implementation.

author: dblevins
msg: For any EjbModules that have CDI enabled, create a 'Comp' ManagedMean to hold all the java:comp level bindings created by CDI beans
Allows for a consistent "shared module" scope feel for CDI even when in or out of the embedded container or a webapp
As well injection and lookup can now more accurately take place against this larger namespace (as a fallback)
A bunch of the old code still pending delete

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-4467: LifecycleStrategy should be started/stopped when CamelContext is starting/stopping
